subSections.title: Glyph origin
Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=gài,er=y
|m_note=Erhua-ed pronunciation - only the noun senses
|c=goi3,koi3
|c_note=koi3 - only the non-common-noun senses
|h=pfs=koi
|md=gái
|mn=kah/kòa/kài/tw:kap/khap
|mn_note=kah - vernacular (“to cover”); kòa - vernacular (noun); kài - literary; kap - literary (“to cover”); khap - vernacular (“to cover”)
|mn-t=gai3
|mn-t_note=gai3 - “to cover”
|w=2ke
|mc=1
|oc=1
|ma=y
|cat=v,n,m:a,adv,con,pn
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[cover]]; to [[conceal]]
#: {{zh-x|蓋被|to put on a blanket|MN}}
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} to [[cover up]]; to [[conceal]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[put on]]; to [[apply]]
# to [[stamp]]; to [[affix]] (a seal)
# to [[overwhelm]]; to [[surpass]]
# to [[build]]; to [[construct]]
# to [[talk]] [[nonsense]]; to [[chatter]]
# [[cover]]; [[cap]]; [[lid]]
# [[shell]] (of a turtle, crab, etc.)
# {{†}} [[thatch]]; [[straw]] [[mat]]
# {{†}} [[canopy]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} [[excellent]]; [[fantastic]]
# {{lb|zh|Zhangzhou|&|Taiwan Min Nan|Southern Sixian|_|Hakka}} [[very]]
#* {{zh-x|該{Te} 係 蓋 久 蓋 久 个{e} 以前，𠊎 還 蓋 細 蓋 細 个{e} 時節，𠊎 還 蓋 細 蓋 細 个{e} 時節|That is a '''very''', '''very''' long time ago, when I was still '''very''', '''very''' small, when I was still '''very''', '''very''' small.|H|ref='''2006''', {{lang|zh|林姿君}}, {{lang|zh|匍背}} (Hunchback)}}
#* {{zh-x|腔口 趣味 雖然{liân} 毋知\不{m̄}知 講 啥，毋過\勿{m̄}擱 實在 蓋{kài} 好聽。|The accent is interesting; though not understandable, it actually sounds '''really''' nice.|TW|ref='''2016''', {{w2|zh|陳隨意}}, [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fJAG59jl2qQ {{lang|zh|鹿港思帶路}}]}}
# {{†}} [[probably]]; [[roughly]]
# {{†}} [[for]]; [[because]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
